articles.description: The K-pop star visited a hospital Wednesday (March 23) with a sore throat, and, after taking a PCR test, was diagnosed with the novel coronavirus.
articles.content:
BTS‘ J-Hope is resting up after testing positive for COVID-19.

articles.title: Luke Combs Scratched as 2022 CMT Music Awards Performer - Taste of Country
articles.description: Luke Combs won't be performing at the 2022 CMT Music Awards after all. The Doin' This singer has been removed from a list of performers.
articles.content:
Luke Combs won't be performing at the 2022 CMT Music Awards, after all. The "Doin' This" singer has been removed from a list of performers that was first announced on Tuesday (March 22).
